items.sentence: Tom and Mary both work at the same supermarket.
You\'re supposed to be enjoying yourself today.
You\'re the last person I expected to see here.
Tom may be a little slow, but he isn\'t stupid.
It took all weekend for us to paint the garage.
It took three weeks for me to get over my cold.
I thought I was doing what you wanted me to do.
Weren\'t you supposed to do that by yourselves?
Please call me as soon as you arrive in Boston.
I\'m afraid that what Tom said wasn\'t correct.
That man sitting over there is a famous singer.
Tom asked Mary to be attentive during meetings.
Tom became a French teacher when he was thirty.
Tom began to tell Mary about what had happened.
Tom heard a noise behind him and turned around.
Tom didn\'t realize that he had made a mistake.
Did you have to share a room with your brother?
You would\'ve enjoyed the movie we went to see.
Tom watched Mary throwing rocks into the water.
Tom didn\'t know that that was going to happen.
